summary: Dependable Computer Application Analyst with extensive experience diagnosing and troubleshooting network, hardware, and desktop issues; tracking and evaluating IT infrastructure incidents; and diverse healthcare and government exposure. Expertise in systems applications, technical helpdesk, information protection analysis, on-call troubleshooting in distributed multi-tier environments. Advanced skills with Epic medical software to register patients and train doctors and nurses on data entry; Epic Pelican Project team member for LSU Medical Science Center; collaborated with FMOL Health System Epic Go-Live team; led Application Analyst role for LSU Medical Science Experience (Patient Access Rep).

experience.title: Patient Access Rep
experience.description: Responsible for obtaining complete and accurate demographic data; enters data in computer thoroughly on patients; notifies patients of co-payments, deductibles or deposits; trains new employees on how to navigate Epic software.

experience.title: Geek Squad Consultation Agent
experience.description: Diagnosed and resolved clients' computer problems; upgraded hardware/software on clients' computers; knowledge of Microsoft Operating Systems; removed viruses and malware.

experience.title: Technical Support Specialist
experience.description: Demonstrated advanced product knowledge with AT&T products; opened and managed trouble ticket system for issues; patient, courteous and friendly with customers; abided by and supported management directives.

experience.title: EHR Application Analyst
experience.description: Worked closely with the medical staff to assure Epic access; supported End users locally and remotely with technical issues; worked with the Epic go-live team to implement Epic; troubleshot issues and ensured all interfaces worked.

experience.title: Computer Analyst
experience.description: Provided primary technical support to over 5,000 staff; trained employees and updated new training documentation; set up new accounts for the doctors and employees.

experience.title: Computer Asst/Functional Adm.
experience.description: Resolved computer desktop and laptop issues; knowledge and skills using Remedy and FootPrints; led the team morning meetings; recommended new software to management as needed.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Information Systems, Telecommunication Systems Support
Associate of Science in Computer Network Engineering
Military Service - United States Navy (Honorable Discharge)
